main event: An observer in Middleboro, Massachusetts, reported seeing a blue luminous object descending at a slow rate of speed, which was concluded to likely be a meteor.
interesting points: The observer was looking at the sky early in the morning when the sighting occurred., The object was described as having a blue luminous color., The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 seconds., The angle of elevation during the sighting was noted as 4.8 degrees., A representative from the Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory suggested the object was probably a small meteor.
witness description: an observer looking out a window
